captions.text: So you going to ComicCon this year?

ComicCon, you mean that super crowded thing
at the convention center?
Yea.
Why would I wanna go to that?

Because it's fun, dude! You get to celebrate
the popular arts.
There's so much to learn and see.

Yea, see things like thousands of people
standing in a line.

Or thousands of other people, bumping into
one another.

It's like a massive ant farm, except the ants
wear costumes and carry giant bags everywhere.
What's wrong with costumes?

Nothing, I'm just not into cosplay, that's
all.
Since when?
Since always.
You dress up like a bat all the time.
I dress like a bat because I'm Batman.
Still, those lines are way too long.

Not for me. If I want to see an exclusive
trailer in hall H...
I just float comfortably

from outside and brrr x-ray vision, super
hearing, watch it with ease.
I don't think you're supposed to do that.

Well, line the place in lead if it means that
much to you.

Are there gonna be any good movie promos this
year?
Uhh, let's see, Iron Man 3..
The Avengers wasn't Iron Man 3?
Pacific Rim...
what is that?

I don't know, something about giant robots
and aliens.
Ok..
the Hobbit, Lord of the Rings prequel.
It's not exactly a prequel but yes.
And yours truly, the Man of Steel.
So why don't you wanna be there?

Because I'm the movie ComicCon deserves, but
not the one it needs.
You know what I mean?

What like the Twilight movie? Is that what
it needs?
Maybe.
Get your butt to the Con right now.
You can't make me.
Yes I can.
How can you make your costume look so real?
Because I'm Batman!

just confusing myself.﻿
